useCase.name: Add New PPoPCode Cases to Derivation Logic

mainSequence.step: Broker Team Member selects option to add PPoPCode cases in Broker UI
Broker UI sends a request (00*****, 00FORGN) to add new PPoPCode cases to Validation Rules API
Validation Rules API updates derivation rules
Validation Rules API integrates new PP codes into logic
Derivation Logic Module retrieves updated rules from Validation Rules DB
Derivation Logic Module confirms the logic update
Validation Rules API displays a success message in Broker UI
Broker UI shows confirmation of PPoPCode addition to Broker Team Member
